name: extract data for updates with header

parameters.path: =/output_id{{ $('select company data').last().json.company_id }}_camp_{{ $('Get high demand ads').last().json.campaign_id }}_{{ $('select company data').last().json.start_date }}_{{ $('select company data').last().json.end_date }}.xlsx

parameters.query: select c.*, ((ri.start_date AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')::date)::text as start_date,((ri.end_date AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')::date)::text as end_date, ri.campaign_yandex_id from companies c, report_import ri where c.company_id=c.company_id and c.company_id=$1 and ri.import_id=$2

options.queryReplacement: ={{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.company_id }},{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.import_id }}

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO business_processes_states (business_process_id, company_id,n8n_workflow_execution_id,n8n_workflow_root_execution_id, started)
SELECT MAX(business_process_id), $2,$3,$4, NOW()
FROM public.business_processes
WHERE n8n_process_name = $1;

parameters.command:
if [ ! -f package.json ]; then npm init -y >/dev/null 2>&1; fi
if [ ! -d node_modules/exceljs ]; then npm i exceljs >/dev/null 2>&1; fi

parameters.query: update business_processes_states set finished=NOW(),tokens_used=0,steps_passed=1,steps_total=1 where business_process_id=(select MAX(business_process_id) from business_processes where n8n_process_name=$1) and n8n_workflow_execution_id=$2

parameters.command:
=node xlsx_apply_template.js \
  template.xlsx \
  target.xlsx \
  output.xlsx \
  12 1 1 \
  "{{ $('select company data').last().json.campaign_yandex_id }}" \
  "{{$('When Executed by Another Workflow').first().json.minus_words}}" \
  true

parameters.content: Используется локальный JS script чтобы использовать подключаемую библиотеку и не разбираться с правами. Скрипт деплоится на машину и пересоздается после каджого редиплоя

parameters.query:
SELECT
  '-' AS add_adv,
  /* key_word с заглавной первой буквой */
  CASE
    WHEN al.key_word IS NULL OR al.key_word = '' THEN al.key_word
    ELSE UPPER(SUBSTR(al.key_word, 1, 1)) || SUBSTR(al.key_word, 2)
  END AS key_word,
  al.company_id,
  al.service_id,
  al.report_id,
  al.campaign_id,
  ag.group_name,
  ag.group_yandex_id,

  /* ad_header: замена #...# на max_kw + заглавная первая буква */
  CASE
    WHEN rep.hdr IS NULL OR rep.hdr = '' THEN rep.hdr
    ELSE UPPER(SUBSTR(rep.hdr, 1, 1)) || SUBSTR(rep.hdr, 2)
  END AS ad_header,

  /* ad_text: замена #...# на max_kw + заглавная первая буква */
  CASE
    WHEN rep.txt IS NULL OR rep.txt = '' THEN rep.txt
    ELSE UPPER(SUBSTR(rep.txt, 1, 1)) || SUBSTR(rep.txt, 2)
  END AS ad_text,

  ads.ad_url,
  cs.service_bid
FROM ads_list         al
JOIN ads_groups       ag  ON ag.ads_group_id  = al.ads_group_id
JOIN ads_for_groups   ads ON ads.ads_group_id = ag.ads_group_id
JOIN company_services cs  ON cs.service_id    = al.service_id

/* берём key_word с максимальным count_views в рамках группы и компании */
CROSS JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT replace(al2.key_word, '"', '') AS max_kw
  FROM ads_list al2
  WHERE al2.ads_group_id = ag.ads_group_id
    AND al2.company_id   = al.company_id
  ORDER BY COALESCE(al2.count_views, 0) DESC, al2.key_word
  LIMIT 1
) kw

/* предварительно формируем строки после замены #...# */
CROSS JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT
    regexp_replace(ads.ad_header, '#[^#]*#', '#' || kw.max_kw || '#', 'g') AS hdr,
    regexp_replace(ads.ad_text,   '#[^#]*#', '#' || kw.max_kw || '#', 'g') AS txt
) rep

WHERE
  al.is_own_brand   = FALSE
  AND al.to_upload_ad = TRUE
  AND al.is_hi_demand = FALSE
  AND al.company_id  = $1;

SELECT
  '-' AS add_adv,
  ad.*,
  cs.service_bid,
  regexp_replace(
    cs.service_name,
    '[^a-zA-Zа-яА-ЯёЁ ]',
    '',
    'g'
  ) AS cleaned_service_name,
  gm.group_minus_words
FROM ads_list ad
JOIN company_services cs
  ON cs.service_id = ad.service_id

-- минус-слова по группе (может не найтись → NULL)
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT
    string_agg(
      mw.minus_word,
      ', ' ORDER BY mw.weight desc
    ) AS group_minus_words
  FROM ads_list al
  JOIN current_list cl
    ON replace(al.key_word, '"', '') = lower(
         regexp_replace(
           cl.used_keyword,
           E'\\+|-.+$',   -- убрать все '+' и всё после первого '-'
           '',
           'g'
         )
       )
  JOIN minus_words_origin org
    ON org.list_id = cl.list_id
  JOIN minus_words mw
    ON org.minus_word_id = mw.id
  WHERE al.company_id = ad.company_id
    AND al.key_word   = ad.key_word
    AND al.report_id  = ad.report_id
) gm ON TRUE

WHERE ad.is_hi_demand = TRUE
  AND ad.company_id   = $1
  AND ad.to_upload_ad = TRUE
ORDER BY cs.service_name, ad.count_clics DESC;

SELECT
  string_agg(NULLIF(btrim(ql.link_header), ''),      '||' ORDER BY link_id) AS link_headers_text,
  string_agg(NULLIF(btrim(ql.link_description), ''), '||' ORDER BY link_id) AS link_descriptions_text,
  string_agg(NULLIF(btrim(ql.link_url), ''),         '||' ORDER BY link_id) AS link_urls_text
FROM public.adv_campaign_quick_links ql  where ql.campaign_id=$1;
